item.title: Backend Developer at Bunsan
item.description: Role Overview: as a Backend Developer I participated in a big e-commerce company. The challenges in which I support: Resolving bugs of discount campaigns Adding telemetry for some metrics Migrating API’s from REST to GraphQL Implementation of a new type of discount Refactoring code Implementation for download dynamic excel generation files with a lot of information. Interesting challenges: The e-commerce project is really big, so I needed to study a lot of topics that I didn’t know.

item.title: Elixir intern at Bunsan
item.description: Role Overview: As Fullstack Developer I participed in a system for register the projects, skills, skill level, status, occupation time, level in each skill, areas, vacations and assignments of each employee. The challenges in which I support: Implementation of a new dynamic call to assign a call to employees once a month for interaction between them. Implementation of a new section in the application to generate dynamic reports by date to obtain a summary of each employee Implementation of a new section to assign the corresponding area to each employee Fixing logic bugs Migrating API’s from REST to Graphql Implementing a new tool to identify an employee using the phone camera Interesting challenges: The system was the first in which I contributed, so I needed to study new topics that I didn’t know before, for example:
